And I think there’s a lot of evidence that they’re still lashed up with him and therefore i think it’s a safe assumption that they are probably performing opposition research, if you wish to call it that, for Organizing for Action… and their purpose for it is pretty clear – destroying the Trump presidency.”

Breitbart News Daily airs on SiriusXM Patriot 125 weekdays from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m. Eastern.

Said Gaffney in discussing the unmasking controversy, citing the duration of the effort and potential involvement of others, “I think that there’s unquestionably a political warfare operation being run by their former boss, Barack Obama.

Frank Gaffney, president of the Center for Security Policy spoke with Breitbart News Daily SiriusXM host Raheem Kassam on Wednesday regarding the Russian metro bombing and also the Susan Rice unmasking controversy.
